docs.title: AI Engineer & Senior Hands-On Architect
docs.text:
I design and build production-grade AI systems that go beyond experimentation—combining Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), Agentic AI, and scalable backend APIs with proven cloud-native engineering practices.

With 10+ years of experience in enterprise software, I focus on transforming LLM capabilities into scalable, reliable, and highly available systems that solve real business problems.

docs.title: 🔹 Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
docs.text:
• Enterprise knowledge assistants over PDFs, APIs, and internal systems
  • Embedding strategies, chunking trade-offs, and vector search optimization
  • Grounded responses with citations and hallucination controls

docs.title: 🔹 Agentic AI Systems
docs.text:
• Tool-using agents with planning, memory, and structured workflows
  • Multi-agent systems for analysis, automation, and decision support
  • Practical agent design focused on control, safety, and debuggability

docs.title: 🔹 Backend APIs for AI
docs.text:
• Cloud-native APIs that operationalize LLM workloads
  • Event-driven and asynchronous microservices
  • Observability-first design for AI systems in production

docs.title: How I Approach AI Engineering
docs.text:
I approach AI engineering with the same rigor as distributed systems:

  • Architecture first — clear boundaries, responsibilities, and failure modes
  • Evaluation matters — accuracy, latency, cost, and consistency are measurable
  • Observability built-in — AI systems must be traceable and debuggable
  • Production mindset — notebooks evolve into services, pipelines, and platforms

AI doesn’t remove the need for engineering discipline—it raises the bar.

docs.title: Experience Snapshot
docs.text:
• Principal Software Engineer – Dell Technologies Designing and supporting large-scale, cloud-native systems used in production environments.

  • Background across Cloud platforms, microservices, event-driven architectures, reliability engineering, and observability.

  • AI & ML Education Post Graduate Program in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning (The University of Texas at Austin)

This blend allows me to bridge AI innovation with enterprise reality.

docs.title: Featured Work
docs.text:
This portfolio showcases hands-on AI systems, including:

  • RAG chatbots over real-world document collections
  • Embedding-based semantic search and similarity systems
  • Agentic AI workflows with tool execution and control logic
  • Backend services that make LLMs usable in production

Each project includes:

  • Clear problem statements and use cases
  • Architectural decisions and trade-offs
  • Technical implementation details
  • Links to source code and live demos

docs.title: 👉 View Projects
docs.text: Explore detailed case studies, architectures, and implementations of the AI systems I’ve built.

docs.title: Connect
docs.text:
• GitHub – Source code, notebooks, and experiments
  • Hugging Face – Live demos and curated collections
  • LinkedIn – Professional background and experience
